title: The Company Data Domain Schema
description: Contains the public registered information about an entity

EntityId.title: Internal Id for entities
EntityId.description: Contains Axesor360 unique ID for the entity

VendorEntityId.title: Vendor Id for Entities
VendorEntityId.description: External Id (from vendors) for the entity

EntityName.title: Entity name
EntityName.description: Full name or business name of the entity

LastUpdate.title: Info about last update
LastUpdate.description: Date of last update of the date contained

PublicationsList.title: List of Publications
PublicationsList.description: List of publications or document filings concerning one or more events related to the entity

VendorReferenceId.title: Vendor Reference Id
VendorReferenceId.description: Internal vendor code thar references the specific publication

PublicationDate.title: Date of Publication
PublicationDate.description: Date of publication of the event in the original source

FilingDate.title: Date of Filing
FilingDate.description: Date of filing of the event in the register or similiar

Year.title: Year of filing date
Year.description: Year of filing of the event in the register or similiar

FiledIn.title: Filed in
FiledIn.description: Place or administration where the events where filed

Source.title: Publication Source
Source.description: Source or media whereas the related event was published

FullText.title: Full detail of the event
FullText.description: Full text published on the original source
examples: Constitución. Comienzo de operaciones: 08-03-1996. Duración: INDEF. Objeto social: CONSULTORIA, SOPORTE, DESARROLLO, EXPLOTACION, DISTRIBUCION Y VENTA DE PRODUCTOS...

PublicationReference.title: Publication Reference code
PublicationReference.description: External code that unequivocal appoints to the event in the original source

PublicationNumber.title: Publication number
PublicationNumber.description: Original document publication number, if applies

PublicationName.title: Original name
PublicationName.description: Name of the entity in the moment of the event (could be different from the actual one)

PublicationURL.title: Publication URL
PublicationURL.description: Link (URI) to the original publication (pdf, image...)

DepositEnrollmentYear.title: Year of deposit or enrollment
DepositEnrollmentYear.description: Year of account deposit (Spain, Portugal...) or enrollment (Colombia)

ReferenceDetails.title: Reference details
ReferenceDetails.description: Contains specific information that references the original publication. The RefLevel1 must be used for the most generic value, using the rest for subsequent details

Date.title: Reference date
Date.description: Reference date, usually the same that the filing date

RefLevel1.title: Level 1 Reference detail
RefLevel1.description: Generic field used for a level one detail of a reference (e.g. Borme's Volume)

RefLevel2.title: Level 2 Reference detail
RefLevel2.description: Generic field used for a level two detail of a reference (e.g. Borme's Book)

RefLevel3.title: Level 3 Reference detail
RefLevel3.description: Generic field used for a level three detail of a reference (e.g. Borme's Folio)

RefLevel4.title: Level 4 Reference detail
RefLevel4.description: Generic field used for a level four detail of a reference (e.g. Borme's Section)

RefLevel5.title: Level 5 Reference detail
RefLevel5.description: Generic field used for a level five detail of a reference (e.g. Borme's Sheet)

RefLevel6.title: Level 6 Reference detail
RefLevel6.description: Generic field used for a level six detail of a reference (e.g. Borme's Inscription)

EventsList.title: List of events
EventsList.description: List of different events related to the parent publication

Type.title: Publication related type
Type.description: Act or event type that describes the subject of the event published

TypeGroup.title: Publication related group type
TypeGroup.description: Parent group for act or event types that describes the subject of the event published

VendorTypeId.title: Vendor Type Id
VendorTypeId.description: Internal vendor code used to refer its specific act or event type

VendorTypeGroupId.title: Vendor Type Group Id
VendorTypeGroupId.description: Internal vendor code used to refer its specific act or event parent group type

Priority.title: Event priority or relevance
Priority.description: Determines the relevance of the event; the higher the prioriry, the higher the value

TypeHelp.title: Event type help
TypeHelp.description: Short generic explanation about the meaning of the event type
examples: Constitución: Inscripción de la creación formal de la Sociedad para dar comienzo a sus operaciones, adquiriendo, a su vez, personalidad jurídica

OtherData.title: Other data
OtherData.description: Custom data related to the event, depending on the type

Datatype.title: Other data's datatype
Datatype.description: Schema datatype for the event data used

Tag.title: Other data's tag
Tag.description: Tag that describes the event data used

Value.title: Other data's value
Value.description: Value for the event data used

RelatedEntities.title: Related entities
RelatedEntities.description: Related entities taking part in the event

VendorId.title: Vendor Id of the related entity
VendorId.description: External Id (from vendors) of the related entity

AlternativeVendorId.title: Alternative Vendor Id of the related entity
AlternativeVendorId.description: Second External Id (from vendors) of the related entity, sometimes used for canonical name identifiers

Name.title: Related Entity name
Name.description: Full name or business name of the related entity

AlternativeName.title: Alternative name of the related entity
AlternativeName.description: Alternative version name (from vendors) of the related entity, sometimes used for canonical names

Type.title: Relationship type
Type.description: Type that describes the relationship between the related entity and its parent

TypeGroup.title: Relationship group type
TypeGroup.description: Classification that sorts the relationship between the related entity and its parent

Detail.title: Detailed text
Detail.description: Text with additional information about the relationship between both entities

StartingDate.title: Relationship' starting date
StartingDate.description: Starting date in case of, for example, a time-limited designation

FinishingDate.title: Relationship' finishing date
FinishingDate.description: Finishing date in case of, for example, a time-limited designation
